Recommendations

Movies

  • Schindler's List - Ooof.. Amazing Film
  • Interstellar - Obviously
  • Taare Zameen Par - First movie that hooked me emotionally
  • Shutter Island - Mind blown

TV Shows

  • The Sopranos - The GOAT
  • HIMYM
  • The Inbetweeners - The UK version. Massively underrated outside the UK
  • It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia

Podcasts

  • Chris Williamson - Modern Wisdom - Great guests, great conversations
  • Conan O'Brien Needs a Friend - Love Love Love Conan. His absurdist, clever, often self-deprecating humour is peak. The greatest to ever do it. There will never be another Conan.

Enter the rabbit hole of his YouTube channel and you'll see what I mean: Team Coco's YouTube channel.

Music

  • Oasis/ Liam Gallagher/ Noel Gallagher - Used to be my favourite musician(s), but can't lie, they fell off
  • Hollow Coves - New favourite
  • Arctic Monkeys - Still dope
  • Seafret
  • Chance Peña
  • The Shins
  • Hans Williams
  • Travis
  • Billy Joel/ Stone Roses/ The Verve/ Jack Johnson/ ... - The list goes on...
